articles.title: The Asus Zenfone 11 Ultra is bigger than ever - The Verge
articles.description: Asus is known for its smaller Android flagships, but the Zenfone 11 Ultra is anything but. It comes with a big 6.78-inch screen and a massive 5,500mAh battery.
articles.content:
The Asus Zenfone 11 Ultra is more screen, less zen
